column1: Recipients of basic security benefits: Länder,
reference month per quarter, sex/age groups/location of
Basic security in old age,reduced earning capacity

March 2015:
Undercoverage in several Länder, especially in Berlin. For
Germany, undercoverage is estimated at 10,000 - 15,000
recipients of basic security benefits in old age and in
cases of reduced earning capacity.

June 2015:
Undercoverage in Berlin, Bremen and, especially, Hessen.
For Germany, undercoverage amounts to roughly 900 recipients
of basic security benefits in old age and in cases of
reduced earning capacity.

March 2017:
Undercoverage in several Länder, especially in Hessen. For
Germany, undercoverage is estimated at 1,500 recipients of
basic security benefits in old age and in cases of reduced
earning capacity.
